<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sneak Attacker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5094) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Rogue](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=216), [Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=48) (Level 6), [Verduran Shadow](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=312) (Level 6), [Lion Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=319) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Rogue Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5092)

</column>

---

You gain the sneak attack class feature (page 167), except it deals 1d4 damage, increasing to 1d6 at 6th level. You don’t increase the number of dice as you gain levels.
